Reviews.Title: Great Company to work with!!
Reviews.Author: Richard Freeze
Reviews.Content: Great seller, great communication.Nice people to work with. Would have rated them a 10 but, found one issue the phone did not come with a Micro Sim card. This item should have been clearly Noted!! Could have save time and I could have order one from them at the same time.  Would buy from them, Near perfect condition as stated, a success!!

Reviews.Title: I am never buying anything from AMAZON again - especially not electornics!
Reviews.Author: Nedda Viscovich
Reviews.Content: The item I received was defective. It was supposed to have been refurbished - which would lead one to believe that it was tested prior to being resold.  I could not get internet service, the voice calls had echoes and static and the power button did not work.  Overall this phone should never have been resold.The sellers replacement policy was  not acceptable.  They wanted me to return the phone and then they would send me a replacement - which would mean I would be without a phone for at least ten days.  the other option was for me to buy another phone, return the original and they would then process a refund.  NOT acceptable.  I paid for a working phone, it should be their responsibility to see to it that I had one.  Furthermore, they want me to pay for return shipping even though the phone was defective.
